name: Yocto Linux for SYS6440
short_description:
SmartPlay Technologies project for  Yocto build based Linux distribution on InForce(R) SYS6440 platform using the Qualcomm(R) Snapdragon(TM) – APQ8064. 

Release highlights:
·         First Yocto build based Linux distro on Qualcomm(R) 8064 reference platform.
·         Sato UI environment with Poky based Yocto Project 1.5 - Dora.
·         Based on the Linux Kernel v3.4 from Code Aurora Forum, and proprietary firmware from Inforce(R) SYS6440 Android BSP Rel v1.5
·         X11 and Wayland/ Weston 1.4 support
·         Hardware accelerated graphics using open source Freedreno and Mesa libraries
·         Hardware video playback using gst-omx on gstreamer 1.0 and libhybris
·         UI based Audio playback
·         Wifi using QCA6234x

Please refer readme.txt packaged in the release binaries SP_Linux_SYS6440_rls_1.0.0.tar.gz for steps to flash and execute released features.

Any questions or support request please mail linuxsolutions@smartplayin.com.
summary: Smartplay's Yocto build based Linux distribution on InForce SYS6440
